sentences.sentence: Many of his films (The Grifters, Bullets over Broadway, Being John Malkovich) have been rather big hits with the Academy, but Cusack's neurotic protagonists never quite charge to the front.
sentences.translation: 他的很多电影（如：《致命骗局》，《子弹横飞百老汇》，《傀儡人生》）都是奥斯卡大热，但是库萨克所饰演的这位有点神经质的主角并没有很出彩。
